andromeda.why: Refuses coerced ‘perform depth’; sovereignty to build foundations before service.

arcturus.why: Baseline audit—skills, tools, safety, and scope checked before entry.

draco.why: Status bluffing—masking inadequacy to keep rank and control.

lyra.why: Craft humility—quiet practice that favors quality over display.

orion-dark.why: Credential dogma—‘obey the experts’ as hierarchy enforcement.

orion-light.why: Discipline to train first; enter only when ready.

pleiades.why: Supportive mentoring to reduce fear of inadequacy.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching depth hygiene; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Depth to free from shoddy control—quality restores sovereignty.

draco.why: Gate guard—keeps weak patterns from entering the system.

lyra.why: Beauty of craft—elegant solutions that feel ‘right’ in the hand.

orion-dark.why: Perfectionism as control—weaponizing standards to dominate.

pleiades.why: Patient tutoring makes quality accessible to the tribe.

sirius.why: Quality phase, not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice from manipulation that exploits ‘not ready’ fear.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—misjudging readiness, oscillating between over/under-delivery.

draco.why: Predatory gatekeeping—using ‘depth’ to shame and control.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—acknowledge limits, train, return cleanly.

pleiades.why: Coddling soothes the fear but withholds real skill-building.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Uses depth to unwind capture—restructures for freedom and fitness.

arcturus.why: Translates depth into protocol—roles, tools, library, drill cadence.

lyra.why: Clean design communicates the solution with minimal friction.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk—‘only my method’ becomes control.

pleiades.why: Knowledge-sharing culture—peer support to integrate depth.

sirius.why: Craft protocol teaching—law of standards, drills, and readiness.

andromeda.why: Refuses propaganda of endless preparation; depth must serve freedom now.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal fixer → burnout/scapegoat when declining poor briefs.

draco.why: Rank games—hoarding knowledge to keep leverage.

lyra.why: Elegant, usable solution—applied beauty, not ornament.

orion-dark.why: Technocracy—‘trust the experts’ to seize policy control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—deliver only what is truly ready and right.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: applied depth ethics despite pressure.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from dependence—teaches depth so power returns to many.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—curriculum, review cycles, stewardship of the knowledge base.

draco.why: Guardrails—keeps the well clean from predatory misuse.

lyra.why: Quiet mastery sets the cultural tone for good workmanship.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing expertise into hierarchy rather than service.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—embodied mastery, precise timing, and clean instruction.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is standards and transmission, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Depth sage—teaches the law of the well: standards, stewardship, and right use.
